command:
#!/System/Library/Frameworks/Ruby.framework/Versions/1.8/usr/bin/ruby -wKU
require "shellwords"

link = STDIN.read
if link =~ /RFC\s*(\d+)/i
  url = "http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc#$1"
  %x{ /usr/bin/open #{url.shellescape} }
else
  abort "Not an RFC link: ‘#{link}’"
end
name: Open RFC Link
